data.name: Pizza Hunt! How to hunt pizza (And Not Die Doing It) - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The soundtrack for Pizza Hunt! How to Hunt Pizza (And Not Die Doing It).
High Quality.

There are 12 mp3 tracks which can be found in the soundtrack folder which is in the Pizza Hunt ANDDI installation folder.
Track Listing
  • 1 ANDDI Start Screen (2:32)
  • 2 ANDDI Intro (1:02)
  • 3 ANDDI Town Theme (2:09)
  • 4 ANDDI Forest 1 (3:45)
  • 5 ANDDI Boss 1 Theme (2:06)
  • 6 ANDDI After Boss Death Theme (1:59)
  • 7 ANDDI Forest 2 (3:09)
  • 8 ANDDI Boss 2 Theme (2:16)
  • 9 ANDDI Forest 3 (3:58)
  • 10 ANDDI Boss 3 Theme (2:47)
  • 11 ANDDI Victory Room (1:55)
  • 12 ANDDI Ending Theme (2:59)
